content: I'm happy to put on auction my reimagination of the Bitcoin rollercoaster guy memeBitcoaster, 2018, Acrylics and Gold on Canvas, Framed as on photo, 70x100cm/27,6‚Äùx39,4‚Äù (+ frame width) Bid Format:  BTCStarting Bid: 0.05 BTCMinimum Bid Increment: 0.005 BTCAuction End Time: Thursday, November 30st, 2023 @23:59:59 CET ¬†countdown clock: https://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/generic?iso=20231130T00&p0=736&msg=Auction+end&font=sanserif&csz=1Sniping:  15 minute standard sniping rule - Any bid made within the last 15 minutes of the auction, will restart a 15 minute clock for each bid thereafter.Shipping: Paid for by buyer. Ships from Europe. Buyer responsible for any and all customs/duties. Seller is responsible for packaging cost! Payment Address: 1Dqt8AsKaRdaWNqruPmUkqseqLm9YXZaPPayment Due: Within 24 hoursEscrow: Available at cost of buyer...Bitcoaster, 2018, Acrylics and Gold on Canvas, Framed as on photo, 70x100cm/27,6‚Äùx39,4‚Äù (+ frame width) Also used as meme for reference:Selected parts of the painting were gilded with golden leafs:

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Great artwork as always bro!¬† Goodluck with your auction and sale!

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Yes, agreed with Krogoth.If you have the Sats to spare and most importantly the right room for this, it seems like a must get for the real Bitcoin collector / enthusiast. Lovely piece.

comments.author: 1Dq
comments.body: Quote from: krogothmanhattan on November 03, 2023, 06:09:31 PM¬† Great artwork as always bro!¬† Goodluck with your auction and sale! Quote from: Kryptowerk on November 04, 2023, 12:59:40 AMYes, agreed with Krogoth.If you have the Sats to spare and most importantly the right room for this, it seems like a must get for the real Bitcoin collector / enthusiast. Lovely piece.Thanks guys! I'm excited to see where this one (and others) end up. Oh, I forgot to mention you can hang this one in 5 different ways:You can hang it however you feel that day!

comments.author: BitcoinPenny
comments.body: Confession: I clicked on this thread and saw the start date of November 4 and immediately thought, "Aww. Too bad this is a months old thread. I would've liked to bid on this one." For some reason, I was thinking it's already March or April. My, god. I'm so absentminded lately. Argh! LOLAnyway, I agree with krogothmanhattan and Kryptowerk. If you can buy an artwork by 1Dq, then I'd advise you to buy it. Personally, I have one, and I love it. (And I look forward to bidding on this one!)Regards,Chris@TBPCo.

(And I look forward to bidding on this one!)Regards,Chris@TBPCo.Great to hear from you BitcoinPenny and thank you for you kind words!Can't wait for those bids to start¬† Cheers!

comments.body: AUCTION ended.WINNER: StackItUp with 0.05BTCCongratulations, I'll PM you for transaction details.Cheers.

comments.author: 1Dq
comments.body: StackItUp won the auction.I packed the artwork.We figured out cheap and reliable shipping.12 days later Bitcoaster hangs on a wall so perfect, as if build for it:Thanks again, StackItUp, for buying my artwork and supporting my work.Cheers!
